name: lambda-typescript-dev-env-boilerplate
description: Just a simple boilerplate project you can start with if you wan to develop lambda in typescript without the need of serverless framework. It handles swc/tsc, add jest, eslint, prettier, create production ready lambda, and allow seamless development in typescript with on the fly compilation. I use the official lambda docker images.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:node_modules
scripts.build:swc: npm run clean:dist && swc src -d dist && mv dist/src/* dist && rm -rf dist/src
scripts.quality: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format && npm run test
